Constructor Detail

Parser

public Parser(URL url,
              Context context)
       throws FeedNotFoundException,
              AtomFeedNotSupportedException
Retrieves the feed URL from the HTML page and saves the feeds into internal memory and retrieves details about the feed page

Parameters:
url - URL from which feeds should be shown
context - the context to use. Usually your Application or Activity object.
Throws:
FeedNotFoundException
AtomFeedNotSupportedException

getArticles

public ArrayList<Article> getArticles(int topicNumber)
                               throws IOException
Returns the articles in the feed

Parameters:
topicNumber - feed number for which articles are to be obtained. Pass 0 if only one feed link is present.
Returns:
an ArrayList of Article class
Throws:
IOException

parseForArticles

private void parseForArticles(XmlPullParser pullParser)
                       throws XmlPullParserException,
                              IOException
The actual parsing of the XML file is done by this method

Parameters:
pullParser - an instance of XMLPullParser whose input has been set
Throws:
XmlPullParserException
IOException
